++ Process Mathematics Matrix



+++ SUMMARY

* rectangular array or table of numbers, symbols, or expressions, 
* arranged in rows and columns, 
* used to represent a mathematical object or a property of such an object. 



* example
  * |01  09  −13|
    |20  05  −06| 
   
  * two rows and three columns;
    * "two by three matrix"
    * "2×3-matrix"
    * matrix of dimension 2×3.
